rukus.text: Sano katema kawaiche achimitenga Wetu kwa Ibrahima ni abali jakusengwasya watite: “Chisimu uwwe chitwajonanje achinsyene awu musi (wa Sodomu), chisimu achinsyene wakwe awele walupuso.”

(Ibrahima) jwatite: “Chisimu mwalakwemo mwana Lutwi.” Wanganyao watite: “Uwwe tukwamanya chenene wali mwalakwemo. Chisimu uwwe chitun’jokole jwalakwe ni liwasa lyakwe ikaweje wankwakwepe, chawe mwa akusigalila munyuma (chajonanjidwe).”

Sano pawagambile kum’bichilila Lutwi achimitenga Wetu, jwadandawile yawaganyao nikuwanikwa nao chidali (pakwaajogopela kuti atakutendedwa matanyula, ni kusowa yakuti kaachenjele, ligongo nganiwamanya kuti achimalaika). Wanganyao ni watite: “Nkajogopa soni nkadandaula, chisimu uwwe chitun’jokole mmwe ni liwasa lyenu ikaweje wankwenupe, chawe mwa akusigalila munyuma (chajonanjidwe).”
“Chisimu uwwe tusigele panandi kwatuluchisya achinsyene awu musi (wa Sodomu) ipotesi kutyochela kwinani ligongo lya kunyosya kwao.”
Soni chisimu pamasile patwalesile mwalakwemo chimanyilo chakuonechela kwa wandu waakwete lunda

Sano (kuwandu wa) ku Madiyana (twantumisye) nnongo n’jao (jwali) Shuaibu. Basi jwatite: “E wandu wangu! Mun’galagatilani Allah, ni llijogope Lisiku Lyambesi, soni nkajendagajendaga pa chilambo kupita nchiwatanganya.”
Ni wankaaniile, basi ni chakwembekenye chisikinya, mwanti wachelelwe (ali wawe) m’majumba mwao chitindiwalile

Nombe nao soni achina Adi ni achina Samuda (twajonasile), soni pamasile pakuonechele kukwenu (konasika kwao) kuumila m’malo mwao muwatamaga (mwamusyuchile kuwa m’masame). Soni shetani ni jwasalalichisye wanganyao itendo yao (yangalumbana), basi ni jwasiwilile wanganyao kwitala (lyagoloka) namuno kuti waliji wakulolechesya (pakutenda ichindu)

Nombe najo soni Qaruna, Firiauna ni Hamana (twajonasile). Soni chisimu chene pamasile pajwaichilile wanganyao Musa ni isimosimo yakuonechela, basi ni walikwesyisye pachilambo, kutendaga nganawa wanti ni kumpunda (Allah, mwanti ni kunnepelekasya kwapa ilagasyo)

Basi jwalijose (mwa wanganyao) twankwembekenye ni sambi syakwe. Basi wane mwa jamanjao pana watwatumichisye chimbunga cha sakalawe, wane mwa wanganyao pana wawakwembekenye n’gumilo (waipotesi), wane mwa wanganyao pana watwatitimisye nalyo litaka, soni wane mwa wanganyao pana watwamisyisye. Sano Allah nganijuwa jwanti ni kwatenda lupuso wanganyao, nambo kuti wanyao ni wawaliji nkulitenda lupuso achimisyene

Chilandanyo cha awala walitendele jwinepe jwangawaga Allah kuwa kaligoselo, chili chisawu nyangata jwalitendele nyumba (ja lundandambuli jangawa nkun’gosa kuchitukuta namuno mbepo), soni chisimu naga nyumba jangali machili ninyumba ja nyangata, ingawe wanganyao wamanyililaga
Chisimu Allah jukuimanya ichindu iliyose yaakuilumbanjila wanganyao kunneka Jwalakwe, soni Jwalakwe ni Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwalunda lwakusokoka
Soni yalakweyo ni ilandanyo yatukupeleka ku wandu, ni ngakuitaga mu lunda ikaweje wakumanyililape
Allah jwagumbile mawunde ni mataka mwakuonaonape, chisimu mu yalakweyo mwana chilosyo kwa wakulupilila
